short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your favorites in a single Touch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This product is used to access the websites that you are frequently using in a single click. Once a frequently using URL is added to this extension they can easily access the page frequently.
